sentences.en: A budger surplus may be used to redeem state debt.
sentences.cn: 预算盈余可用于偿还国债.

sentences.en: A very good feature will sometimes redeem several bad ones.
He decided to redeem the pledge.
He had no way to redeem his furniture out of pawn.
sentences.cn: 他无法赎回典当的家具.

sentences.en: He spent the rest of the game trying to redeem himself after a first-minute mistake.
sentences.cn: 比赛余下的时间里，他都在尽力弥补开局时的失误。

sentences.en: He tried by every means to redeem the pawn.
sentences.cn: 他千方百计要赎回典当物.

sentences.en: I'm going to redeem my gold watch.
Jenny could redeem the stolen money from the thief after he was arrested.
sentences.cn: 在小俞被逮捕后,珍妮可取回被偷的钱.

sentences.en: Make sure you know exactly what you will be paying back when you plan to redeem the item.
sentences.cn: 务必弄清楚将来赎回物品时需要支付多少钱。

sentences.en: Olivier’s performance redeemed an otherwise second-rate play.
sentences.cn: 奥利维尔的表演补救了一出本是二流水平的戏。

sentences.en: She determined to redeem her error so far as it might yet be possible.
sentences.cn: 她决心在尽可能的情况下来补偿自己的过失.

sentences.en: The acting was not good enough to redeem the ( awfulness of the ) play.
sentences.cn: 该剧 ( 很糟糕 ),演得好也于事无补.

sentences.en: The amount required to redeem the mortgage was £358,587.
sentences.cn: 需要偿还的抵押贷款总计358,587英镑。

sentences.en: The excellent acting wasn't enough to redeem a weak plot.
sentences.cn: 精彩的表演不足以掩盖情节的拙劣。

sentences.en: The eyes redeem the face from ugliness.
sentences.cn: 这双眼睛弥补了他其貌不扬之缺陷.

sentences.en: We redeem a promise by doing what we said we would.
sentences.cn: 我们怎么说就怎么做以,履行我们的诺言.

sentences.en: Work is the way that people seek to redeem their lives from futility.
sentences.cn: 工作可以避免人们虚度生命。

words.tran_cn: 可赎回的；可偿还的；可挽救的；可换成现款的
救世主；赎身者；偿还者；买回者
履行；挽回；补救（redeem的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 赎回；挽回；兑换；履行；补偿；恢复
赎回，挽回，履行，偿还，兑现
